# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width = 10)
    lines = []
    current_line = ""
    
    for word in split(text, r"\s+"))
        if occursin(r"\W+$", word) || 
           (length(current_line) + length(word)) > text_width)
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = word
        else
            current_line *= " " * word
        end
    end
    
    if !isempty(current_line)
        push!(lines, current_line)
    end
    
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

example_text = "This function will wrap words into lines"
wrapped_example = wrap_string(example_text)
println(wrapped_example)
```
